sentences.en: As a sophomore, I feel that the time flies.
sentences.cn: 作为一个大二学生，我觉得光阴似箭。

sentences.en: He is in his sophomore year.
sentences.cn: 他在读二年级.

sentences.en: His daughter, Louise, is by now a college sophomore.
sentences.cn: 他的女儿，路易斯，现在是大学二年级学生。

sentences.en: I am a freshman ( sophomore, junior, senior ).
sentences.cn: 我是大一 ( 大二, 大三, 大四 ) 学生.

sentences.en: I am a sophomore of ForeignDepartment of Shengli college, China Petroleum University.
sentences.cn: 本人系中国石油大学胜利学院外语系大二的一名学生.

sentences.en: I met Jack in my sophomore year high school English class.
sentences.cn: 高中二年级的英语课上,我认识了杰克.

sentences.en: I was in the judo club, and got Second Dan rank during my sophomore year.
sentences.cn: 我参加过柔道社, 在二年级的时候得到了二段.

sentences.en: I'd been in television since I was 19 and a sophomore.
sentences.cn: 我在19岁还是大学二年级的时候就已经上了电视。

sentences.en: I'm a college sophomore majoring in English.
sentences.cn: 我是一名英语专业的大二学生.

sentences.en: In his first week as a sophomore, he built CourseMatch, a program that enabled users to figure out which classes to take based on the choices of other students.
sentences.cn: 在大学二年级的头一个星期，他就编写了一个名叫“课程搭配”的程序，它可以让用户根据其他学生的选课情况来给自己选课。

sentences.en: It was June 2001, and just the thought of causing any more pain to 20-year-old Michael, a college sophomore diagnosed a few months earlier with a rare form of leukemia, made her anxious.
sentences.cn: 那是在2001年六月，20岁的迈克尔是一所大学二年级的学生，几个月前他被查出患了一种罕见的白血病。 一想到又要给儿子增加痛苦她就感到不安。

sentences.en: Lily is a Sophomore now.
sentences.cn: 莉莉现在大学二年级.

sentences.en: Once having begun sophomore year , Jerusha's life seemed even more full of fun and excitement.
sentences.cn: 念了大二之后, 洁茹的生活似乎更加多采多姿了.

sentences.en: One day , in November of Ginny's sophomore year, Aunt Peg's phone stopped working.
sentences.cn: 金妮高中二年级十一月的一天, 佩格姨妈的电话打不通了.

sentences.en: Sophomore year: Commissary in charge of organization of the League branch of the class.
sentences.cn: 二年级: 本班团支部组织委员.

sentences.en: Table tennis sophomore elective, it is not about a physical movement.
sentences.cn: 大二选修乒乓球, 又是一门不讲究体能的运动.

sentences.en: This is a group of watercolors and watercolor is sophomore at the school's copying.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这一幅是我临摹的最成功的.这是在我正式学水彩画之前的那个暑假画的.

sentences.en: When I got cut from the varsity a sophomore in high school, I learned something.
sentences.cn: 当我高二从校队里被刷下来时, 我懂得了一些东西.

sentences.en: When my son was a hign-school sophomore, he got a part-time job sacking groceries at a supermarket. He came home all smiles.
sentences.cn: 我儿子在一所中学读二年级时，在一家超级市场找到了一份包装商品的业余工作。他满面笑容地回到了家。 。

sentences.en: You see, I am a sophomore and Miss Yang is a junior.
sentences.cn: 你瞧, 我是2年级的,杨小姐是三年级的.

words.tran_cn: 复杂的；精致的；久经世故的；富有经验的
使变得世故；使迷惑；篡改（sophisticate的过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 二年级的；二年级学生的
（中等、专科学校或大学的）二年级学生
trans.tran_en: a student who is in their second year of study at a college or  high school
